## Description The image is a logo for the brand "KÄRCHER." The logo features the brand name in bold, uppercase letters. The text "KÄRCHER" is centered and prominently displayed in black on a bright yellow background. Below the brand name, there is a black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The overall design is simple yet striking, using high contrast colors to ensure visibility and brand recognition. ## K 3 PREMIUM POWER CONTROL Die Premium-Variante des K 3 Power Control-Hochdruckreinigers enthält zusätzlich eine Schlauchtrommel. Der Anwendungsberater gibt Tipps per App – für effizientere Reinigungsergebnisse. ## Description The image depicts a yellow pressure washer with a compact and portable design. It features a sturdy handle at the top for easy maneuverability and two large wheels at the base for transportation. The body of the pressure washer has a vented design, likely for cooling purposes, and a prominent logo or label on the front. Attached to the pressure washer is a hose reel, which is neatly wound and positioned at the back. The device comes with two interchangeable nozzles or spray wands, which are shown lying in front of the machine. These nozzles are designed for different spray patterns or intensities, indicated by their distinct shapes and sizes. The overall design suggests a focus on user convenience and efficiency, with easy-to-access components and a compact form factor suitable for home or light commercial use. The bright yellow color is likely intended for visibility and brand recognition. ## Document Details - **Bestell-Nr.**: 1.602-750.0 ### Features - Power Control-Pistole mit Druckstufenanzeige - Schlauchtrommel - Reinigungsmitteltank ## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4054278622828
Stromart V / Hz 220 - 240 / 50 - 60
Druck bar / MPa 20 - max. 120 / 2 - max. 12
Fördermenge l/h max. 380
Flächenleistung m²/h 25
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung kW 1.6
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 5.6
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 7.9
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 340 × 281 × 677
## Ausstattung
Hochdruckpistole G 120 Q Power Control
Vario Power Jet [x]
Dreckfräser [ ]
Integrierte HD-Schlauchtrommel [ ]
HD-Schlauch m 7
Geräteseitiges Quick Connect [x]
Reinigungsmittelansatz über Tank
Integrierter Wasserfilter [x]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [x]
## Description The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with the text "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" around the top and a star symbol in the center. Below the emblem, there is a rectangular section with the text "RECORD HOLDER" in bold capital letters. The colors used are primarily blue, white, and gold. The badge signifies that the holder has achieved a world record recognized by Guinness World Records. ### Figure Description The image is a graphic representation with a large number "1" in the background, partially visible and shaded in gray. Overlaid on this is a bright yellow arrow pointing to the right. Inside the arrow, the text reads: **WORLD'S NO. 1 FREELANCE ONLINE BRAND** This suggests a claim of being the top brand in the freelance online market. The use of bold, capitalized text emphasizes the importance and confidence in the statement. The yellow color of the arrow is likely intended to draw attention and convey a sense of urgency or importance. ## Description The image is a circular icon with a teal background. Inside the circle, there is a white outline of a hand holding a test tube. The test tube is vertically oriented and contains the numbers "3", "2", and "1" stacked on top of each other, with "3" at the top and "1" at the bottom. The numbers are enclosed within the test tube, which is depicted in a simplified, stylized manner. The hand is shown in a gripping position, with the thumb on one side and the fingers on the other, suggesting a secure hold on the test tube. The overall design is minimalistic and uses a monochromatic color scheme with teal and white. ## Description of Figure The image is a graphical representation with a black background and yellow elements. It features a stylized icon of a power plug with a lightning bolt above it, indicating electrical power or energy. Below the icon, there is text that reads "+100% POWER" in yellow. The design suggests an emphasis on increased power or efficiency, possibly related to an electrical or technological context. The use of bold colors and simple imagery conveys a message of enhanced performance or capability. ## Description The image is a symbol or icon labeled "VARIO POWER." It features a stylized depiction of a pressure washer nozzle with an adjustable power setting. The nozzle is shown emitting a spray, and there is a plus sign (+) indicating an increase in power. The background is black, and the elements are in yellow, which suggests a focus on visibility and caution. The icon likely represents a feature of a pressure washer that allows the user to vary the power of the spray.

## Description

The image is a logo for the brand "KÄRCHER." The logo features the brand name in bold, uppercase letters. The text "KÄRCHER" is centered and prominently displayed in black on a bright yellow background. Below the brand name, there is a black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The overall design is simple yet striking, using high contrast colors to ensure visibility and brand recognition.

## K 3 PREMIUM POWER CONTROL

Die Premium-Variante des K 3 Power Control-Hochdruckreinigers enthält zusätzlich eine Schlauchtrommel. Der Anwendungsberater gibt Tipps per App – für effizientere Reinigungsergebnisse.

## Description

The image depicts a yellow pressure washer with a compact and portable design. It features a sturdy handle at the top for easy maneuverability and two large wheels at the base for transportation. The body of the pressure washer has a vented design, likely for cooling purposes, and a prominent logo or label on the front.

Attached to the pressure washer is a hose reel, which is neatly wound and positioned at the back. The device comes with two interchangeable nozzles or spray wands, which are shown lying in front of the machine. These nozzles are designed for different spray patterns or intensities, indicated by their distinct shapes and sizes.

The overall design suggests a focus on user convenience and efficiency, with easy-to-access components and a compact form factor suitable for home or light commercial use. The bright yellow color is likely intended for visibility and brand recognition.

## Document Details

- **Bestell-Nr.**: 1.602-750.0

### Features

- Power Control-Pistole mit Druckstufenanzeige
- Schlauchtrommel
- Reinigungsmitteltank

## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4054278622828
Stromart V / Hz 220 - 240 / 50 - 60
Druck bar / MPa 20 - max. 120 / 2 - max. 12
Fördermenge l/h max. 380
Flächenleistung m²/h 25
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung kW 1.6
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 5.6
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 7.9
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 340 × 281 × 677

## Ausstattung

## Description

The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with the text "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" around the top and a star symbol in the center. Below the emblem, there is a rectangular section with the text "RECORD HOLDER" in bold capital letters. The colors used are primarily blue, white, and gold. The badge signifies that the holder has achieved a world record recognized by Guinness World Records.

### Figure Description

The image is a graphic representation with a large number "1" in the background, partially visible and shaded in gray. Overlaid on this is a bright yellow arrow pointing to the right. Inside the arrow, the text reads:

**WORLD'S NO. 1 FREELANCE ONLINE BRAND**

This suggests a claim of being the top brand in the freelance online market. The use of bold, capitalized text emphasizes the importance and confidence in the statement. The yellow color of the arrow is likely intended to draw attention and convey a sense of urgency or importance.

## Description

The image is a circular icon with a teal background. Inside the circle, there is a white outline of a hand holding a test tube. The test tube is vertically oriented and contains the numbers "3", "2", and "1" stacked on top of each other, with "3" at the top and "1" at the bottom. The numbers are enclosed within the test tube, which is depicted in a simplified, stylized manner. The hand is shown in a gripping position, with the thumb on one side and the fingers on the other, suggesting a secure hold on the test tube. The overall design is minimalistic and uses a monochromatic color scheme with teal and white.

## Description of Figure

The image is a graphical representation with a black background and yellow elements. It features a stylized icon of a power plug with a lightning bolt above it, indicating electrical power or energy. Below the icon, there is text that reads "+100% POWER" in yellow. The design suggests an emphasis on increased power or efficiency, possibly related to an electrical or technological context. The use of bold colors and simple imagery conveys a message of enhanced performance or capability.

## Description

The image is a symbol or icon labeled "VARIO POWER." It features a stylized depiction of a pressure washer nozzle with an adjustable power setting. The nozzle is shown emitting a spray, and there is a plus sign (+) indicating an increase in power. The background is black, and the elements are in yellow, which suggests a focus on visibility and caution. The icon likely represents a feature of a pressure washer that allows the user to vary the power of the spray.
